title: Mid-Term Examination Schedule
content: The mid-term examinations for the 2025-2026 academic session will commence on October 15th, 2025. Does please ensure all continuous assessment scores are submitted before then.
author: Admin

title: Public Holiday - Independence Day
content: The school will be closed on October 1st in observance of Independence Day. Classes will resume strictly on October 2nd.
author: Propreitor

title: Emergency Staff Meeting
content: All staff members are required to attend a mandatory briefing at the main hall tomorrow at 8:00 AM.
author: Principal

title: Inter-House Sports Competition
content: We are excited to announce the annual Inter-House Sports competition scheduled for next month. Parents are invited to cheer for their children.
author: Sports Director
